scripts.publish:dev: npm run build:dev && node redirect.js dev && node -e "try{require('fs').rmSync('.publish',{recursive:true,force:true});require('fs').rmSync('.cache/gh-pages',{recursive:true,force:true})}catch(e){}" && gh-pages -d dist -b gh-pages -r https://github.com/sidarthus89/EVE-Data-Site-Dev.git -f
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && cross-env VITE_REQUIRE_PRECOMPUTED_ROUTES=false VITE_DATA_BASE=https://sidarthus89.github.io/EVE-Data-Site/data vite build --mode development --sourcemap
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && cross-env VITE_REQUIRE_PRECOMPUTED_ROUTES=true vite build
scripts.publish:prod: npm run build:prod && node redirect.js && node -e "try{require('fs').rmSync('dist/data/region_hauling',{recursive:true,force:true})}catch(e){}" && gh-pages -d dist -b gh-pages -r https://github.com/sidarthus89/EVE-Data-Site.git
